about_the_game:
Humans are near extinction. Only a few remain living in isolation and those that are found are used for slave labor, pleasure, or worse...

You play as Luccia, a warrior torn from her home, with only her friend Rhed they must stop the extinction. Even if that means Luccia must repopulate the human race...

Breaking away from the overcrowded Adult Visual Novel style game, Heavy Hearts is an action game with lewd content.


A QUALITY RPG INTERTWINED LEWD THEMES:
- Exploration, looting, and trading: Scavenge various materials across the land to craft new items and unlock sexy scenes.
- Use stealth to sneak around, avoiding detection from sentient races looking to cash in on rare breeds of humans...
- ATB Fights! Normal attacks build the ATB gauge (called NRG). Each filled gauge adds a Combat Orb to your Hud, which can be used for abilities.
- Magic at your fingertips: With each orb you fill, you can charge Magic a level, and blast enemies away with a fierce elemental attack!

A WORLD WHERE HUMANS ARE ENDANGERED:
- Meet fantastical races across the land from Orcs, Drakes, Lycans and more...
- Make lasting relationships, fall in and out of love, and attempt to repopulate the human race.
- Conversate with your diverse teammates, and build friendships into something more...
